Brockton.Cardinal Spellman High School (Brockton,: Cardinal Spellman High School is a private college preparatory high school of Catholic denomination established in 1958 and located in Brockton, Massachusetts, United States. Like the school's fellow Catholic school and sports rival, Archbishop Williams High School, it operates separately from the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Boston. The school is named after Cardinal Francis Spellman.
